abstract: Charlie Rose confirmed Monday that he was in talks with CBS about a role on "The Early Show."
snippet: Charlie Rose confirmed Monday that he was in talks with CBS about a role on "The Early Show."
lead_paragraph: The television interviewer Charlie Rose confirmed Monday that he was in talks with CBS about a role on "The Early Show," the network's perennial third-place morning program.

headline.main: Charlie Rose in Talks With 'The Early Show'
